allow:
Bash(/tmp/comparison.txt << 'EOF'
PARALLEL PATTERN COMPARISON
===========================

getIgnoreReason Pattern \(existing\):
┌─────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐
│ Private function: getIgnoreReason\(\)                 │
│ • Regex: A11Y_IGNORE_REGEX                          │
│ • Checks current line first                         │
│ • Falls back to previous line                       │
│ • Returns string | null                             │
│                                                     │
│ Export wrapper: getIgnoreReasonForLine\(\)            │
│ • @internal JSDoc tag                               │
│ • Takes 1-based line number                         │
│ • Converts to 0-based index                         │
│ • Bounds checking                                   │
│ • Calls private function                            │
└─────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘

getContextOverride Pattern \(new - IDENTICAL STRUCTURE\):
┌─────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐
│ Private function: getContextOverride\(\)              │
│ • Regex: A11Y_CONTEXT_REGEX                         │
│ • Checks current line first                         │
│ • Falls back to previous line                       │
│ • Returns ContextOverride | null                    │
│                                                     │
│ Export wrapper: getContextOverrideForLine\(\)         │
│ • @internal JSDoc tag                               │
│ • Takes 1-based line number                         │
│ • Converts to 0-based index                         │
│ • Bounds checking                                   │
│ • Calls private function                            │
└─────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘

Code side-by-side:

IGNORE \(lines 589-605\):               CONTEXT \(lines 613-653\):
┌────────────────────────────────┐   ┌────────────────────────────────┐
│ function getIgnoreReason\(      │   │ function getContextOverride\(    │
│   lines, lineIndex             │   │   lines, lineIndex             │
│ \) {                            │   │ \) {                            │
│   const currentMatch =         │   │   const currentMatch =         │
│     A11Y_IGNORE_REGEX.exec\(\)   │   │     A11Y_CONTEXT_REGEX.exec\(\)  │
│   if \(currentMatch\)            │   │   if \(currentMatch\)            │
│     return currentMatch[1]... │   │     return parseContextParams\(\) │
│                                │   │                                │
│   if \(lineIndex > 0\) {         │   │   if \(lineIndex > 0\) {         │
│     const prevMatch =          │   │     const prevMatch =          │
│       A11Y_IGNORE_REGEX.exec\(\) │   │       A11Y_CONTEXT_REGEX.exec\(\)│
│     if \(prevMatch\)             │   │     if \(prevMatch\)             │
│       return prevMatch[1]...   │   │       return parseContextParams│
│   }                            │   │   }                            │
│   return null;                 │   │   return null;                 │
│ }                              │   │ }                              │
│                                │   │                                │
│ export function               │   │ /** @internal ... */           │
│ getIgnoreReasonForLine\(        │   │ export function               │
│   lines, line1Based            │   │ getContextOverrideForLine\(     │
│ \) {                            │   │   lines, line1Based            │
│   const idx = line1Based - 1;  │   │ \) {                            │
│   if \(idx < 0 ||               │   │   const idx = line1Based - 1;  │
│       idx >= lines.length\)     │   │   if \(idx < 0 ||               │
│     return null;               │   │       idx >= lines.length\)     │
│   return getIgnoreReason\(...\); │   │     return null;               │
│ }                              │   │   return getContextOverride\(\); │
│                                │   │ }                              │
└────────────────────────────────┘   └────────────────────────────────┘
EOF)

Bash(git -C /Users/e.cicognani/Mamoka/Git/Netbuilder/a11y-audit commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: single-element @a11y-context attaches override to ClassRegion

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C /Users/e.cicognani/Mamoka/Git/Netbuilder/a11y-audit commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: region resolver uses contextOverride for pair generation

When a ClassRegion has a contextOverride from @a11y-context annotations,
the resolver now uses override.bg for background resolution and
override.fg to replace the text color. All generated pairs from
annotated regions get contextSource: ''annotation''. Hex bg overrides
route through the inlineStyles path; Tailwind class overrides go
through the contextBg path. Moved contextSource from ContrastResult
to ColorPair so the resolver can set it at pair-generation time.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
